example.eg: Getting through airport security is always a hassle.
example.egtrans: 通过机场安检总是一件困难的事情。

example.eg: Jim gave another customer at the bar some hassle and got kicked out.
example.egtrans: 吉姆找酒吧的另一位顾客麻烦，于是被赶了出去。

example.eg: Growing your own vegetables means you get to cook with fresh ingredients straight from your garden; it's definitely worth the hassle.
example.egtrans: 种植自己的蔬菜意味着您可以直接从花园里采集新鲜食材来烹饪，这样的劳神费心绝对值得。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 费心, 尽力, 忙活

example.eg: Why go to the hassle of baking your own bread when there's a great bakery just across the street.
example.egtrans: 街对面就有一家很棒的面包店，为什么还要亲自劳神费力地烤面包呢？

example.eg: Street hawkers always hassle Karen when she's walking around downtown.
example.egtrans: 当凯伦在市中心散步时，街头小贩总是来烦她。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 毫无麻烦的, 异常轻松的
